description:
The last member of the Witches 5, Cyprine, manages to steal a large number of pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Meanwhile, Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa`s power and kidnaps her!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Hametsu no Kage! Chinmoku no Messiah no Mezame
Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens
破滅の影! 沈黙のメシアの目覚め
